data.name: errBadPasswordLength
data.value: Password must be between 6 and 20 characters long.

data.name: errEmailInUse
data.value: '{0}' is already used for an account.

data.name: errGenericCreateAccountError
data.value: An error has occured creating the account: {0}

data.name: errGenericUpdateError
data.value: An error has occured saving the account: {0}

data.name: errInvalidEmail
data.value: '{0}' does not appear to be a valid email address
data.comment: {0} is replaced by the provided address

data.name: WelcomeTitle
data.comment: {0} is replaced by the app name ("MyFlightbook")

data.name: EditProfileDeleteCFIConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this instructor?

data.name: EditProfileDeleteStudentConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this student?

data.name: EditProfileRequestHasBeenSent
data.value: A request has been sent to {0}. Their name will appear here when they accept your invitation.

data.name: EmailChangedSubjectLine
data.comment: subject line for email that confirms an email change

data.name: errBadPasswordToChange
data.value: Incorrect password supplied; you must provide your current password in order to change it.

data.name: errNeedBothQandA
data.value: To change your secret question and answer, you must type BOTH a new question and a new answer

data.name: errPasswordsDontMatch
data.value: You must successfully type your new password twice

data.name: errPleaseTypeNewQandA
data.value: Please type a new secret question and answer

data.name: EndorsementDisclaimer
data.value: You can issue an endorsement to a student, or record an endorsement that you have given to a student off-line

data.name: EndorsementRequest
data.value: Let us know what we should add.

data.name: EndorsementRequestPrompt
data.value: Don't see a template you need?

data.name: EndorsementReturnToProfile
data.comment: Shown when there is an error.

data.name: errNoCFICertificate
data.value: You must have a CFI/CFII/GI certificate number in your profile in order to endorse students.

data.name: errNoCFIExpiration
data.value: You must provide an expiration date for your CFI/CFII/GI certificate in your profile in order to endorse students.

data.name: errNotAuthorizedToEndorse
data.value: You are not authorized to endorse this user. Please establish a student/instructor relationship first.

data.name: EmailWeeklyMailUnsubscribeLink
data.value: Click here to manage your email subscription settings.

data.name: EmailMonthlySubject
data.comment: {0} is the name of the month.

data.name: EmailTotalsPriorMonthHeader
data.comment: {0} is the name of the month, {1} is the year.

data.name: errUnsubscribeNotFound
data.value: The specified email address was not found.

data.name: UnsubscribeSuccessful
data.value: All subscribed email for {0} has been cancelled.

data.name: errNotConfiguredDropBox
data.value: You are not configured for Dropbox. Please set this up in your preferences (under Profile)

data.name: errNotConfiguredOneDrive
data.value: You are not configured for OneDrive. Please set this up in your preferences (under Profile)

data.name: errNotConfiguredGoogleDrive
data.value: You are not configured for GoogleDrive. Please set this up in your preferences (under Profile)

data.name: BasicMedErrMedicalNotFound
data.value: Need an FAA Medical dated on or after July 15, 2006

data.name: BasicMedErrNoMedicalCourseWithin2Years
data.value: Need to take a medical factors course

data.name: BasicMedErrNoPhysicalWithin4Years
data.value: Need a visit to a physician

data.name: BasicMedAttachDocumentation
data.value: Upload a photo or PDF record of your course completion or physician checklist

data.name: BasicMedConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this record? It cannot be undone.

data.name: BasicMedDescription
data.value: Under BasicMed, you can do some types of flying without a current medical certificate if you meet a set of conditions, including (among others) the following (see 14 CFR 61.23 for more details):

data.name: BasicMedErrEventInFuture
data.value: This date is in the future

data.name: BasicMedErrEventTooFarBack
data.value: This date is from before BasicMed went into effect

data.name: BasicMedNoEvents
data.value: You have not entered any courses or physician visits

data.name: BasicMedDescriptionA
data.value: You have held a valid medical at some point since July 15, 2006 (be sure to enter this, even if expired)

data.name: BasicMedDescriptionB
data.value: You have taken a course on aero-medical issues within the prior 24 calendar months

data.name: BasicMedDescriptionC
data.value: You have visited a state-licensed physician and completed a checklist within the prior 4 years.

data.name: AboutCloudStorage
data.value: %APP_NAME% can save a backup spreadsheet of your logbook to your cloud drive account

data.name: AuthorizeDropbox
data.value: Authorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Dropbox account

data.name: AuthorizeGDrive
data.value: Authorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Google Drive account

data.name: AuthorizeOneDrive
data.value: Authorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your OneDrive account

data.name: DeAuthDropbox
data.value: De-authorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Dropbox account

data.name: DeAuthGDrive
data.value: Deauthorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Google Drive account

data.name: DeAuthOneDrive
data.value: Deauthorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your OneDrive account

data.name: DropboxIsAuthed
data.value: You have authorized %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Dropbox account.

data.name: GDriveIsAuthed
data.value: You have authorized %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Google Drive account.

data.name: OneDriveIsAuthed
data.value: You have authorized %APP_NAME% to save backups to your OneDrive account.

data.name: appDescriptionAircraft
data.value: Manage the aircraft that you fly, and add new models to the system. You can also define new models of aircraft. You can even create a flying club if you share aircraft with others!

data.name: appDescriptionAirports
data.value: View flight routes, see airports that you've visited, add missing airports. You can even try your skills at identifying airports from satellite imagery.

data.name: appDescriptionLogbook
data.value: Manage your flights and see your currency and totals. You can also upload or download your logbook, and get a printer-optimized view!

data.name: appDescriptionProfile
data.value: Manage your account and preferences for the site. You can even create custom currency rules or deadlines!

data.name: appDescriptionTraining
data.value: Track your progress towards ratings, record endorsements, and manage relationships with students and instructors. You can even earn badges for various achievements!

data.name: ProfileBulkDeleteConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete ALL of your flights? This CANNOT be undone!

data.name: ProfileBulkDeleteFlightsPrompt
data.value: If you want to start over with your logbook, you can bulk-delete all of your flights from your account. THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE! Make sure you have a backup first!

data.name: ProfileDeleteAccountConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to close your account? This CANNOT be undone!

data.name: ProfileDeleteAccountPrompt
data.value: While we're sorry to see anybody go, you can close your account at any time. THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE! Make sure you have a backup first!

data.name: CloudAhoyIsAuthed
data.value: You have authorized %APP_NAME% to work with CloudAhoy
